description: This file defines a Python class OEQemuTarget that extends OESSHTarget to manage QEMU virtual machine instances for testing purposes. It includes methods for starting and stopping QEMU, and sets up dumping utilities for debugging.

classes.name: OEQemuTarget
classes.description: A class representing a QEMU target for testing, capable of starting and stopping VM instances with various configurations.

methods.name: __init__(self, logger, server_ip, timeout=300, user='root', port=None, machine='', rootfs='', kernel='', kvm=False, slirp=False, dump_dir='', dump_host_cmds='', display='', bootlog='', tmpdir='', dir_image='', boottime=60, serial_ports=2, boot_patterns = defaultdict(str), ovmf=False, tmpfsdir=None, **kwargs)
methods.description: Constructor initializing the OEQemuTarget with test parameters, setting up dump utilities and a QemuRunner instance.

methods.name: start(self, params=None, extra_bootparams=None, runqemuparams='')
methods.description: Starts the QEMU VM with given parameters; handles networking setup and error reporting if startup fails.

methods.name: stop(self)
methods.description: Stops the QEMU VM by invoking the runner's stop method.

ctags.name: __init__
ctags.signature: (self, logger, server_ip, timeout=300, user='root', port=None, machine='', rootfs='', kernel='', kvm=False, slirp=False, dump_dir='', dump_host_cmds='', display='', bootlog='', tmpdir='', dir_image='', boottime=60, serial_ports=2, boot_patterns = defaultdict(str), ovmf=False, tmpfsdir=None, **kwargs)
